metadata.title: CVE-2024-21090 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors product of Oracle MySQL (component:Connector/Python).  Supported versions that are affected are 8.3.0 andprior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attackerwith network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Connectors.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized abilityto cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQLConnectors. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Availability impacts).  CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-python package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
